title: Bangladesh plays down IS claim of killing Japanese man
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Bangladesh's government on Sunday played down a statement by the Islamic State group that it was responsible for gunning down a Japanese man... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
